admreg: Middle East and North Africa,Middle East and North Africa

abstracts.cdata!:
The Primary Health Care Project will
            support the Government's efforts to reorganize primary
            health care (PHC) in Jordan and will improve the coverage,
            quality, and efficiency of PHC. The project will include:
            (a) the establishment of 25 new PHC centers, the
            refurbishing of 9 PHC centers, and the establishment of 17
            comprehensive health care centers; (b) training for
            personnel at all levels to work in the new health care
            facilities; (c) audio-visual equipment, materials and
            vehicles to improve and expand health, population and
            nutrition education; and (d) funds for local consultants for
            evaluation of the project, research on key sector topics,
            preparation of future projects, and project management.
